title: Synthesis of phenol formaldehyde resin (PFR) based fluorescence resonance energy transfer (FRET) composites for double channel detection of latent fingerprints
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15647-15655
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01613K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ping Yang, Tingfei Shi, Zhiyuan Liu, Siying Wu, Yuqi Cheng, Kuiliang Li, Hong Zhao
A reversible two-channel fluorescent nanocomposite with fluorescence resonance energy transfer (FRET) effect was designed for the development, analysis, and characterization of latent fingerprints (LFPs).
